attributes.action: increase the compensation for deposits in banks and building societies to 100 percent of 100,000 GBP Sterling.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Further to the current crisis with a major new bank in the high street where this highlighted the inadequate compensation that banks and building societies could offer a consumer should a bank fail, we need a higher protection of 100 percent of savings to 100,000 sterling.
